document.full_text: the finance minister has fired the country?s top tax official for failing to increase revenue collections, efforts seen as critical if greece is to meet its debt obligations, ministry officials said.
document.title: europe: greece: tax official fired for failing to increase revenues
lines_and_colors: the finance minister has fired the country?s top tax official for failing to increase revenue collections, efforts seen as critical if greece is to meet its debt obligations, ministry officials said.
